Package mgui.interfaces.shapes.volume

Class Volume4DRenderer

java.lang.Object
mgui.interfaces.shapes.volume.Volume3DRenderer
mgui.interfaces.shapes.volume.Volume4DRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
InterfaceGraphicListener, Camera3DListener
public class Volume4DRenderer
extends Volume3DRenderer
Renders dynamic volumes; i.e., blend a pixel's colour values from values obtained from 1.) a sample from the time series of a 4D volume and 2.) the base volume. The renderer creates a Texture3D with the appropriate ColorModel, based upon the models of both the base and dynamic volumes. E.g.,
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Andrew Reid
